text: Viktor Stanislavovich Koval (29 September 1947 - 1 February 2021) was a Russian writer, artist and child actor. He was born in Moscow, Russia. His career began in 1955. His best known roles were as Sasha in the 1955 crime movie The Rumyantsev Case and as Ivanov in the 1957 drama movie An Unusual Summer. Koval died on 1 February 2021 in Moscow from COVID-19, aged 73.Поэт и актер Виктор Коваль умер от коронавируса ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1947 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Moscow Category:Russian poets Category:Russian artists Category:Russian movie actors Category:Russian voice actors Category:Russian singers Category:Actors from Moscow Category:Child actors
title: Viktor Koval
